TopicTitle: Could I use a Graphic tablet for 3d modeling & texturing?

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Strange question, I know. But I'm getting a XP-PEN Artist display Graphic tablet in a couple days because I want to get more into art. 

Has anyone used a graphics tablet successfully on Blender? What was your experience?

Edited March 8, 2022 by Vanamonde
I have a cheap UGEE tablet I use for Photoshop that works great. I've never used it in Blender though.

drawing tablet is a must have if you do 3D sculpting work in Blender and Zbrush.
I own both a XPPen Deco 01 V2 and an Artist 15.6 Pro, and really either one is perfectly usable for drawing, sculpting, or modeling. 
pctechtest site has many good info about 3d modeling software and drawing tablets.
